bibl.title: [Receipts] 1804 Oct 25 [of] Josiah Nichol and Return J. Meigs
bibl.note: This document is a receipt dated October 25, 1804 allowing Josiah Nichol to deliver money to Indian Agent Return J. Meigs.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div1.p:
Rec.d 26 Oct. 1804 of Chas. T. Porter Esqr three hundred forty four dollars in silver & a receipt of Col. Meigs for fifty one dollars for & on a/c of Col. R. J. Meigs—Josiah Nichol
M

I have just now received your favor of the yesterdays date. It's not in my power to come to Knoxville for two or three days. If you will leave any sum of money in the hands of Josiah Nichol esqr or Captain Jno. Croquir & take a receipt. I will within a few days call & take the money & send you Bills of Exchange on the Secretary of War for the amount including fifty dollars left in my hands the last-time I recd. money of you

closer.salute: I am Sir Yr Obdt Servant
